pageProduct.name: RID Medicated Insect Repellant Tropical Strength Roll On 100mL
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Rid Medicated Insect Repellant Tropical Strength Roll On provides long lasting protection against mosquitoes for 6 hours. Especially formulated to repel insects in the toughest conditions.

Rid Medicated Insect Repellant Tropical Strength helps protect you and your family against the risk of bites from disease carrying insects - including mosquitoes that may carry Malaria, Ross River Virus & Dengue.

Warnings

For external use only. If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use. If swallowed, seek medical advice. Do not spray near food and food utensils. Avoid contact with spectacle frames, soft plastics, or synthetic fabrics.

DEET Warning: May be dangerous, particularly to children, if used in large amounts on the skin, clothes or bedding, or on large areas of the body, especially if you keep using it for a long time.

Not to be used for any purpose or in any manner, contrary to this label.

Directions

To repel insect pests, apply RID to all exposed skin. Reapply at regular intervals. Do not apply near eyes or mouth. Do not apply to lips, broken skin or babies hands.
